00011 // samplepat.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "sampling.h"
00014 // BestCandidate Sampling Constants
00015 #define SQRT_SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE 64
00016 #define SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE (SQRT_SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE * \
00017                            SQRT_SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE)
00018 // Sample Pattern Precomputation
00019 int line_num = 0; // make this link!
00020 string current_file; // ditto.
00021 // Pattern Precomputation Local Data
00022 static float imageSamples[SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE][2];
00023 static float timeSamples[SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE];
00024 static float lensSamples[SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE][2];
00025 // Pattern Precomputation Utility Functions
00026 static void addSampleToGrid(float sample[][2],
00027                 int sampleNum, SampleGrid *grid) {
00028         int u = GRID(sample[sampleNum][0]);
00029         int v = GRID(sample[sampleNum][1]);
00030         (*grid)[u][v].push_back(sampleNum);
00031 }
00032 inline float Wrapped1DDist(float a, float b) {
00033         float d = fabsf(a - b);
00034         if (d < 0.5f) return d;
00035         else return 1.f - max(a, b) + min(a, b);
00036 }
00037 // Pattern Precomputation Forward Declarations
00038 void BestCandidate2D(float table[][2],
00039                      int count, SampleGrid *grid = NULL);
00040 static void
00041 Redistribute2D(float samples[][2], SampleGrid &pixelGrid);
00042 int main() {
00043         // Compute image sample positions
00044         SampleGrid pixelGrid;
00045         BestCandidate2D(imageSamples,
00046                         SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE, &pixelGrid);
00047         // Compute time samples
00048         ProgressReporter timeProgress(SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE, "Time samples"); //NOBOOK
00049         for (int i = 0; i < SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE; ++i)
00050                 timeSamples[i] = (i + RandomFloat()) /
00051                                          SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE;
00052         for (int currentSample = 1;
00053              currentSample < SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE;
00054                  ++currentSample) {
00055                 // Select best time sample for current image sample
00056                 int best = -1;
00057                 // Find best time relative to neighbors
00058                 float maxMinDelta = 0.;
00059                 for (int t = currentSample; t < SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE; ++t) {
00060                         // Compute min delta for this time
00061                         int gu = GRID(imageSamples[currentSample][0]);
00062                         int gv = GRID(imageSamples[currentSample][1]);
00063                         float minDelta = INFINITY;
00064                         for (int du = -1; du <= 1; ++du) {
00065                                 for (int dv = -1; dv <= 1; ++dv) {
00066                                         // Check offset from times of nearby samples
00067                                         // Compute (u,v) grid cell to check
00068                                         int u = gu + du, v = gv + dv;
00069                                         if (u < 0)             u += BC_GRID_SIZE;
00070                                         if (u >= BC_GRID_SIZE) u -= BC_GRID_SIZE;
00071                                         if (v < 0)             v += BC_GRID_SIZE;
00072                                         if (v >= BC_GRID_SIZE) v -= BC_GRID_SIZE;
00073                                         for (u_int g = 0; g < pixelGrid[u][v].size(); ++g) {
00074                                                 int otherSample = pixelGrid[u][v][g];
00075                                                 if (otherSample < currentSample) {
00076                                                         float dt = Wrapped1DDist(timeSamples[otherSample],
00077                                                                 timeSamples[t]);
00078                                                         minDelta = min(minDelta, dt);
00079                                                 }
00080                                         }
00081                                 }
00082                         }
00083                         // Update _best_ if this is best time so far
00084                         if (minDelta > maxMinDelta) {
00085                                 maxMinDelta = minDelta;
00086                                 best = t;
00087                         }
00088                 }
00089                 Assert(best != -1); // NOBOOK
00090                 swap(timeSamples[best], timeSamples[currentSample]);
00091                 timeProgress.Update(); //NOBOOK
00092         }
00093         timeProgress.Done();; // NOBOOK
00094         // Compute lens samples
00095         BestCandidate2D(lensSamples, SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE);
00096         Redistribute2D(lensSamples, pixelGrid);
00097         // Write sample table to disk
00098         FILE *f = fopen("sampledata.cpp", "w");
00099         if (f == NULL) {
00100                 Severe("Couldn't open sampledata.cpp for writing.");
00101         }
00102         fprintf(f, "\n/* Automatically generated %dx%d sample "
00103                 "table (%s @ %s) */\n\n",
00104                 SQRT_SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE, SQRT_SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE,
00105                 __DATE__, __TIME__);
00106         fprintf(f, "const float "
00107                 "BestCandidateSampler::sampleTable[%d][5] = {\n",
00108                 SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE);
00109         for (int i = 0; i < SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE; ++i) {
00110                 fprintf(f, "  { ");
00111                 fprintf(f, "%10.10ff, %10.10ff, ", imageSamples[i][0],
00112                         imageSamples[i][1]);
00113                 fprintf(f, "%10.10ff, ", timeSamples[i]);
00114                 fprintf(f, "%10.10ff, %10.10ff, ", lensSamples[i][0],
00115                         lensSamples[i][1]);
00116                 fprintf(f, "},\n");
00117         }
00118         fprintf(f, "};\n");
00119         return 0;
00120 }
00121 void BestCandidate2D(float table[][2], int totalSamples,
00122                 SampleGrid *grid) {
00123         SampleGrid localGrid;
00124         if (!grid) grid = &localGrid;
00125         ProgressReporter  //NOBOOK
00126                 progress(totalSamples-1, "Throwing Darts"); //NOBOOK
00127         // Generate first 2D sample arbitrarily
00128         table[0][0] = RandomFloat();
00129         table[0][1] = RandomFloat();
00130         addSampleToGrid(table, 0, grid);
00131         for (int currentSample = 1;
00132              currentSample < totalSamples;
00133                  ++currentSample) {
00134                 // Generate next best 2D image sample
00135                 float maxDist2 = 0.;
00136                 int numCandidates = 500 * currentSample;
00137                 for (int currentCandidate = 0;
00138                      currentCandidate < numCandidates;
00139                          ++currentCandidate) {
00140                         // Generate a random candidate sample
00141                         float candidate[2];
00142                         candidate[0] = RandomFloat();
00143                         candidate[1] = RandomFloat();
00144                         // Loop over neighboring grid cells and check distances
00145                         float sampleDist2 = INFINITY;
00146                         int gu = GRID(candidate[0]), gv = GRID(candidate[1]);
00147                         for (int du = -1; du <= 1; ++du) {
00148                                 for (int dv = -1; dv <= 1; ++dv) {
00149                                         // Compute (u,v) grid cell to check
00150                                         int u = gu + du, v = gv + dv;
00151                                         if (u < 0)             u += BC_GRID_SIZE;
00152                                         if (u >= BC_GRID_SIZE) u -= BC_GRID_SIZE;
00153                                         if (v < 0)             v += BC_GRID_SIZE;
00154                                         if (v >= BC_GRID_SIZE) v -= BC_GRID_SIZE;
00155                                         // Update minimum squared distance from cell's samples
00156                                         for (u_int g = 0; g < (*grid)[u][v].size(); ++g) {
00157                                                 int s = (*grid)[u][v][g];
00158                                                 float xdist = Wrapped1DDist(candidate[0], table[s][0]);
00159                                                 float ydist = Wrapped1DDist(candidate[1], table[s][1]);
00160                                                 float d2 = xdist*xdist + ydist*ydist;
00161                                                 sampleDist2 = min(sampleDist2, d2);
00162                                         }
00163                                 }
00164                         }
00165                         // Keep this sample if it is the best one so far
00166                         if (sampleDist2 > maxDist2) {
00167                                 maxDist2 = sampleDist2;
00168                                 table[currentSample][0] = candidate[0];
00169                                 table[currentSample][1] = candidate[1];
00170                         }
00171                 }
00172                 addSampleToGrid(table, currentSample, grid);
00173                 progress.Update(); //NOBOOK
00174         }
00175         progress.Done(); //NOBOOK
00176 }
00177 static void Redistribute2D(float samples[][2],
00178                 SampleGrid &pixelGrid) {
00179         ProgressReporter progress(SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE, "Redistribution"); //NOBOOK
00180         for (int currentSample = 1;
00181                 currentSample < SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE; ++currentSample) {
00182                 // Select best lens sample for current image sample
00183                 int best = -1;
00184                 // Find best 2D sample relative to neighbors
00185                 float maxMinDist2 = 0.f;
00186                 for (int samp = currentSample; samp < SAMPLE_TABLE_SIZE;
00187                                 ++samp) {
00188                         // Check distance to lens positions at nearby samples
00189                         int gu = GRID(imageSamples[currentSample][0]);
00190                         int gv = GRID(imageSamples[currentSample][1]);
00191                         float minDist2 = INFINITY;
00192                         for (int du = -1; du <= 1; ++du) {
00193                                 for (int dv = -1; dv <= 1; ++dv) {
00194                                         // Check 2D samples in current grid cell
00195                                         // Compute (u,v) grid cell to check
00196                                         int u = gu + du, v = gv + dv;
00197                                         if (u < 0)             u += BC_GRID_SIZE;
00198                                         if (u >= BC_GRID_SIZE) u -= BC_GRID_SIZE;
00199                                         if (v < 0)             v += BC_GRID_SIZE;
00200                                         if (v >= BC_GRID_SIZE) v -= BC_GRID_SIZE;
00201                                         for (u_int g = 0; g < pixelGrid[u][v].size(); ++g) {
00202                                                 int s2 = pixelGrid[u][v][g];
00203                                                 if (s2 < currentSample) {
00204                                                         float dx = Wrapped1DDist(samples[s2][0],
00205                                                                 samples[samp][0]);
00206                                                         float dy = Wrapped1DDist(samples[s2][1],
00207                                                                 samples[samp][1]);
00208                                                         float d2 = dx*dx + dy*dy;
00209                                                         minDist2 = min(d2, minDist2);
00210                                                 }
00211                                         }
00212                                 }
00213                         }
00214                         // Update _best_ for 2D lens sample if it is best so far
00215                         if (minDist2 > maxMinDist2) {
00216                                 maxMinDist2 = minDist2;
00217                                 best = samp;
00218                         }
00219                 }
00220                 Assert(best != -1); // NOBOOK
00221                 swap(samples[best][0], samples[currentSample][0]);
00222                 swap(samples[best][1], samples[currentSample][1]);
00223                 progress.Update(); //NOBOOK
00224         }
00225         fprintf(stderr, "\n"); // NOBOOK
00226         progress.Done(); //NOBOOK
00227 }
